Apple___Apple_scab.cure: Apply fungicides like Captan or Mancozeb. Remove infected leaves.
Apple___Apple_scab.prevention: Avoid overhead watering and prune infected areas regularly.

Apple___Black_rot.cure: Remove mummified fruits and apply thiophanate-methyl fungicide.
Apple___Black_rot.prevention: Ensure proper sanitation and use disease-free seeds.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.cure: Spray protective fungicides like myclobutanil early in the season.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.prevention: Remove nearby juniper trees and choose resistant cultivars.

Apple___healthy.prevention: Continue regular monitoring and proper orchard management.

Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.cure: Use fungicides like azoxystrobin at early signs.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.prevention: Practice crop rotation and use resistant hybrids.

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.prevention: Plant resistant varieties and ensure good air circulation.

Corn_(maize)___healthy.prevention: Maintain healthy soil and regular pest monitoring.

Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.cure: Use fungicides containing pyraclostrobin or propiconazole.
Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Use crop rotation and plant-resistant corn varieties.

Grape___Black_rot.cure: Remove and destroy infected plant material, apply fungicides like mancozeb.
Grape___Black_rot.prevention: Ensure proper pruning and canopy management.

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).cure: Prune infected wood and apply systemic fungicides.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).prevention: Avoid water stress and mechanical injuries.

Grape___healthy.prevention: Maintain regular irrigation and pruning practices.

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.prevention: Improve air flow and avoid wet foliage.

Potato___Early_blight.cure: Use fungicides such as chlorothalonil or mancozeb.
Potato___Early_blight.prevention: Avoid overhead irrigation and remove crop debris.

Potato___healthy.prevention: Use certified seed and manage soil health.

Potato___Late_blight.prevention: Destroy infected tubers and avoid overcrowding plants.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Avoid working with wet plants and rotate crops.

Tomato___Early_blight.cure: Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil or mancozeb.
Tomato___Early_blight.prevention: Mulch plants and water at the base to avoid splash.

Tomato___healthy.prevention: Monitor regularly and maintain garden hygiene.

Tomato___Late_blight.prevention: Remove infected leaves and avoid overhead watering.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.prevention: Ensure proper ventilation and humidity control.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.cure: Apply fungicides with mancozeb or copper.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.prevention: Remove lower infected leaves and increase spacing.

Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.cure: Use miticides like abamectin or insecticidal soap.
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.prevention: Increase humidity and remove infested leaves.

Tomato___Target_Spot.prevention: Avoid high humidity and rotate crops.

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.cure: No known cure. Remove and destroy infected plants.
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.prevention: Disinfect tools and avoid smoking near plants.

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.cure: Remove infected plants and control whiteflies.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.prevention: Use insect-proof nets and plant resistant varieties.
